SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Factories

Class ImgViewFactoryImpl

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Factories.ImgViewFactoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImgViewFactory
public class ImgViewFactoryImpl extends Object implements ImgViewFactory
ImgViewFactoryImpl class is responsible for creating various ImageView components by implementing the ImgViewFactory interface.

  • Field Summary

    • createImageView

      public javafx.scene.image.ImageView createImageView(String assetName, double width, double height)
      Creates a new ImageView with the specified asset name, width, and height.
      Specified by:
      createImageView in interface ImgViewFactory
      Parameters:
      assetName - : The name of the asset to be loaded.
      width - : The width to which the image should be scaled.
      height - : The height to which the image should be scaled.
      Returns:
      A new ImageView containing the specified asset.

    • createPauseButton

      public javafx.scene.image.ImageView createPauseButton(double xPosition, double yPosition, double width, double height, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> action)
      Creates a new ImageView for a pause button with the specified position, size, and action.
      Specified by:
      createPauseButton in interface ImgViewFactory
      Parameters:
      xPosition - The x-coordinate of the pause button.
      yPosition - The y-coordinate of the pause button.
      width - The width to which the image should be scaled.
      height - The height to which the image should be scaled.
      action - The action to be performed when the button is clicked.
      Returns:
      A new ImageView representing the pause button.
